original: Holmgren, Sven Gustaf, major, Ronneby, f. 6/12/76 i Gbg av kamr. Johannes H. o. Klara Wennberg. G. 07 m. Elsa Jonson. Barn: Mats f. 08, Per o. Lars 12. — Mog:ex. v. Gbgs h. real 95, KTH (VoV) 95-99, mil :kurs f. intr. i VVK 99. Löjtn. VVK 06, kapt. 14, major 26. Tjg. i nedre norra väg- o. vattenbyggn :distr. 96, anst. å konstr:kont. i Sthlm 99-00, ing. i mell. väg- o. vattenbyggn:distr. 00-02, byrå-o. baning. v. Bergslag. Järnv. 02-14, avd:ing. v. Lödöse-Lilla Edets järnv :-byggn. 05, Ramshyttan-Idkerbergets dito 10-12, e. lär. v. CTL 07-08, verkst. dir. o. chef f. Blek. Kustbanor 14-42, likvidator i A-B Blek. Kustbanor fr. 42, ing:off. i fo 14 43. Led. av Ronneby stadsfullm. (h) 19-42, v. ordf. 31- 41, ordf. 42, v. ordf. i vatten- o. elverksstyr. 20-41, ordf. 41-42, v. ordf. i byggn :ndn sed. 20, landstingsman 31-39, led. av und :visn :utsk., ordf. i Alilim. valmansförb. lokalavd. i Ronneby t. 42, Blek. turisttrafikfören. arb :utsk. fr. 25, v. ordf. fr. 30, led. av styr. f. Ensk. Järnv. Försäkr :anst. 25-42, Sv. järnv. arb :giv :fören. 34-42 o. Sv. järn-v:fören. 38-42. RNO, RVO.
translated: Holmgren, Sven Gustaf, major, Ronneby, b. 6/12/76 in Gothenburg, son of merchant Johannes H. and Klara Wennberg. Married in 1907 to Elsa Jonson. Children: Mats b. 1908, Per and Lars b. 1912. Graduated from Gothenburg's Higher Real Gymnasium in 1895, KTH (Swedish Royal Institute of Technology) in 1895-99, military course for officers' candidates in VVK (Military Academy Karlberg) in 1899. Promoted to lieutenant in VVK in 1906, captain in 1914, major in 1926. Served in the lower northern road and water works district in 1896, employed at the construction office in Stockholm 1899-1900, followed by engineer positions in the middle road and water works district 1900-1902, the bureau and railway board of Bergslag. Järnväg (ironworks railway) 1902-1914. Division engineer for Lödöse-Lilla Edets railway construction in 1905, Ramshyttan-Idkerbergets railway construction in 1910-1912, temporary teacher at CTL (Chalmers University of Technology) in 1907-1908, executive director and manager for Blekinge Coastal Railway 1914-1942, liquidator for A-B Blek. Coastal Railroads from 1942, engineering officer in Fo 14 (Swedish Armed Forces) in 1943. Member of Ronneby's city council (conservative) 1919-1942, vice chairman 1931-1941, chairman 1942, vice chairman in water and power plant committee 1920-1941, chairman 1941-1942, vice chairman in building committee since 1920, member of the County Council (conservative) 1931-1939, member of the investigation committee, chairman of the Alilim. Valmansförb. local branch in Ronneby until 1942, member of the Blekinge tourist traffic association work committee and vice chairman from 1930, member of the board of Enskilda Järnvägs Försäkringsanst. 1925-1942, member of the Swedish Railway Employers' Association 1934-1942 and Swedish Railway Association 1938-1942. RNO (Knight of the Order of the North Star), RVO (Knight of the Order of Vasa).
